subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: State racing stewards in New York agreed to discontinue their ban on the 4-by-6-inch breathing aid, allowing the colt to race with one in the Belmont Stakes.
snippet: State racing stewards in New York agreed to discontinue their ban on the 4-by-6-inch breathing aid, allowing the colt to race with one in the Belmont Stakes.
